thread.title: Children’s Museum of Manhattan features NYC’s sights, sounds
thread.title_full: Children’s Museum of Manhattan features NYC’s sights, sounds

author: The Associated Press
title: Children’s Museum of Manhattan features NYC’s sights, sounds
text:
Children’s Museum of Manhattan features NYC’s sights, sounds Originally published August 27, 2015 at 7:31 am The Associated Press 
NEW YORK (AP) — An upcoming installation at the Children’s Museum of Manhattan invites kids to explore the sounds, sights and flavors of New York City. 
Young visitors will play-act parallel parking, driving a taxi and writing a parking ticket inside an interactive 3,000-square-foot gallery. 
They can pretend to be a construction worker by moving blocks with a conveyor. Or they can serve up their own creations at “Taste of NYC Food Cart.” 
They can also create their own music inside a soundproof laser tunnel. Most Read Stories
